text: 🚨 Energy crisis update! 🌟 Who's got the priciest electricity and gas in Europe? 🤔After Russia's invasion of Ukraine, pre-tax prices skyrocketed, but they're now on the decline. 💸But which countries have the highest and lowest prices? 🤷‍♂️Well, the data's in, and it's not looking great for some EU nations... 😱Average natural gas prices jumped from €8.6 per 100 kWh to €11.9 per 100 kWh since February 2022! 🔥And electricity prices? They've increased by up to 43% in some countries! 💡But don't worry, folks! We're working hard to secure affordable energy for all Europeans! 💪#EnergyCrisis
